Description: Pottery ostracon bearing Coptic text. Contains 'Prayer for the vesting of a monk', followed by the names of the Roman months June, July, and August in Greek characters, and that of the Coptic month Thōth. Joined to EA 5892
Curator's comments: Attached to EA 5892. EA 5892 + EA 14241 (+ O.Bachit 929) Studied with a view to publication by Mihálykó, 2021.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.23, pl.17)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (111810) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/111810)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 17:2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
